## Assignment 3B Window Functions Approach

For this assignment, I will use a dataset from kaggle that includes bitcoin historical data from 2018 to 2024.  I will use window functions to calculate the year-to-date average and the six-day moving averages for each item.

source: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/novandraanugrah/bitcoin-historical-datasets-2018-2024?select=btc_1d_data_2018_to_2025.csv
